name: ABIA - Index of South and Southeast Asian Art and Archeology
description: ABIA is a database covering South and Southeast Asian prehistory, archaeology of the historical period, art, crafts and architecture (from early down to contemporary), inscriptions and palaeography, coins and seals of these regions. Going back to 1928, up-to-date bibliographic reference source has become the standard of reference in the fields it covers for both specialists as well as students.
